Title: Single-Leg Balances
Directions: Single-Leg Balance Challenges:/n1. Single-Leg Balance: Stand on 1 foot (Hold single-leg balance for 3 seconds)/n2. Kimbo Stand: Cross one leg over the other and touch that toe to the floor. Stretch your arms out to the side to help you balance/n3. Stork Stand: Balance like a bird called a stork. Balance on 1 foot. Put the other foot on the side of your knee. Both arms out to the side. Hold that pose. Try the other leg/n4. Sideways Balance: Stretch your arms to the side. Lift 1 leg straight out to the side. Hold your pose. Switch legs and try again. Hold it steady/n5. Backward Balance: Stretch your arms to the side. Lift 1 leg backward (leg is parallel to the ground) while you lean forward. Hold your pose. Switch/n6. Forward Balance: Stretch your arms to the side. Raise 1 leg in front of you. Point your toes and hold your pose. Switch.

Title: Tumbling Tower
Materials: Blocks or small boxes, a ball.
Directions: 1. Stack the blocks to build a tower. 2. Stand at least 2 feet away and kick the ball into the tower, causing it to break apart. 3. Repeat.

Title: Empty the Milk Jug
Materials: 15-20 white clothespins, Gallon sized milk jug
Directions: Fill the milk jug with the clothespins and have them shake it upside down until they all fall out.

Title: The Sticky Foot Runway
Materials: 4-6ft of contact paper, duct tape, music (optional)
Directions: 1. Tape the contact paper to the floor so it is secure/n2. Remove the contact paper covering/n3. Have the child walk, skip, or jump across the sticky runway.

Title: Musical Bubble Dance
Directions: 1. Secure a large area of bubble wrap to the floor with tape/n2. Play music and dance on the bubble wrap.
